summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sixtieth Avenue Southwest, from the south margin of West Stevens Street to the south margin of West Spokane Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and the construction of temporary wood walks, all in accordance with Majority Petition File No. 62613, of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
